proj7

Class Employee

  • java.lang.Object
    • proj7.Employee
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Executive, Salesperson

    public abstract class Employee
extends java.lang.Object
    The Employee class is abstract and is the superclass to Salesperson and Executive. It handles the employee's name, address, and calculates the salary of the employee.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Employee()
      Constructor that sets the default values for the employee's name, address and salary data fields.
      Employee(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String address, double salary)
      Constructor that sets the initial values for the name, address and salary data fields.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract double getAdditionalIncome()
      An abstract placeholder method for the getAdditionalIncome() method which assures that all subclasses of class Employee must implement this method which is called from the toString() method of this Employee class.
      java.lang.String getAddress()
      Returns a string representing the address of the employee.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns a string representing the name of the employee.
      double getSalary()
      Returns the value of the employee's salary.
      double getTotalSalary()
      Returns the salary of an Employee plus any additional income the earned e.g.(commission).
      void setAddress(java.lang.String address)
      Sets the value for the Employee's address.
      void setName(java.lang.String name)
      Sets the value for the Employee's full name.
      void setSalary(double salary)
      Sets the value for the Employee's salary.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string representation of an employee including the data fields with the return value of the getTotalSalary method and their descriptive labels.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

      • getAdditionalIncome

        public abstract double getAdditionalIncome()
        An abstract placeholder method for the getAdditionalIncome() method which assures that all subclasses of class Employee must implement this method which is called from the toString() method of this Employee class.
        Returns:
        a string representing any additional income gained by the employee

      • getTotalSalary

        public double getTotalSalary()
        Returns the salary of an Employee plus any additional income the earned e.g.(commission).
        Returns:
        a value representing the total salary of an Employee including any commission earned.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of an employee including the data fields with the return value of the getTotalSalary method and their descriptive labels.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a string representation of an Employee
